Description:
Heatseeker, but in a narrow corridor because why not?

If you are using rocket plugin to host the map, make sure to use Soccar as the game mode. [b]Do not use the Heatseeker mode as it breaks ball/players spawns.[/b]


[h1]How to play with friends[/h1]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vfIIa2cUZSE


[h1]Recommended mutators[/h1]
This is what I personally was using when hosting matches.

1v1
[list]
    [*]Ball max speed: Super fast
    [*]Ball physics: Super light
    [*]Ball size: large
    [*]Boost amount: Unlimited
[/list]

2v2
[list]
    [*]Ball max speed: Fast
    [*]Ball physics: Super light
    [*]Ball size: large
    [*]Boost amount: Unlimited
    [*]Ball gravity: High
[/list]

If anyone is interested in playing workshop maps with the community, including this map, feel free to join this discord that was created exactly for that! It's full of players hosting games and wanting to try new maps
https://discord.gg/kVGR4vB
